id.description: Unique hash identifier for the duty. The field is absent on post requests and is defined by the backend.

Task.description: Object that represents a task that must be performed as part of a duty. Ie. a component of a duty that is assigned to one of the participants in a duty

task_id.description: Identifier of the task. Absence of this field indicates a request to create a task meaning it must be assigned an id by the backend

penalty.description: The penalty the person must pay if the taks is not completed

entrusted.description: The person that is responsible for performing this duty. Absence of the field indicates no persion is yet assigned to the task

reports.description: Users who claim the task was not completed.

entrust_start.description: Datetime as 'DD/MM/YY:HH:MM'. May be absent if status is not entrusted

author.description: The username of the user that created the duty.

participants.description: The users that are participating in the duty

id.description: Unique hash identifier for the duty. The field is absent on post requests and is defined by the backend.

Invite.description: An accomodation for potential tasks entrustees

author.description: Owner of the duty and inviter.

duty.description: Id of the duty. Useful if the tasks array is empty and advocate is only an observer
